1. Find the practice exam on [Canvas](https://go.canvas.duke.edu/) under "Files" > "Exams" > `final-exam-fall2023.pdf`

2. You can work on the practice exam with others in class. 

3. The final exam will cover all content through November 21st. In other words, *Hamiltonian Monte Carlo* and *Bayesian model averaging* are the only two lecture topics that cannot be on the final exam.
